subject: Sales
title: Your Website as a Sales Tool
description: A micro-lesson that makes Your Website as a Sales Tool usable.

hook.text: A prospect visits your site. It's outdated, slow, and says nothing useful. Credibility is gone.

buildup.text: A website is your always-on pitch. It works for you while you sleep, travel, and take meetings.

discovery.text: Great sales sites answer three questions fast: who you help, how you help, and what to do next.

twist.text: Many sellers neglect their website entirely. In a digital world, no website is worse than a bad one.

climax.text: Build a clean, fast, simple site. Make value obvious and the next step completely unmissable.

punchline.text: Your website pitches while you sleep. Make it great.

quiz.question: What three questions should a sales website answer immediately?
options: Who you help, how you help, and what to do next
Company history, team bios, and office location
